title: Apple to discontinue the iPod after 21 years
description: The end of an era for Apple's original music player, which has been overshadowed by the iPhone.

title: Fifa: EA Sports to break away from football body
description: Electronic Arts will instead produce new football games under the banner EA Sports FC.

title: UK blames Russia for satellite internet hack at start of war
description: Russia launched an attack on Viasat just before invading Ukraine, the UK and its allies say.

title: Bitcoin value drops by 50% since November peak
description: The slide in the value of cryptocurrencies comes as stock markets around the world have also fallen.
